title: 의도 전달 - 완곡한 권유
description: 완곡하면서도 효과적인 권유를 통해 의도를 전달하는 원어민 수준의 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: How about something like this? Isn't it worth considering?
If it's okay with you, how about trying it this way?
In my personal opinion, I think this direction would be good.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 완곡한 권유 표현 구사

sentences.kr: 혹시 이런 건 어때? 한번 생각해볼 만하지 않아?
sentences.en: How about something like this? Isn't it worth considering?

sentences.kr: 만약에 괜찮다면, 이렇게 해보는 게 어떨까?
sentences.en: If it's okay with you, how about trying it this way?

sentences.kr: 내 개인적인 의견으론, 이 방향이 좋을 것 같은데.
sentences.en: In my personal opinion, I think this direction would be good.

sentences.kr: 굳이 강요하는 건 아니지만, 한 번 시도해볼 만해.
sentences.en: I'm not forcing it, but it's worth a try.

sentences.kr: 이런 아이디어는 어떨까? 꽤 괜찮을 것 같은데.
sentences.en: What about this idea? I think it could be pretty good.

sentences.kr: 나라면 이렇게 할 텐데, 네 생각은 어때?
sentences.en: I would do it this way, but what do you think?

sentences.kr: 시간 날 때 한번 고민해봐. 급한 건 아니니까.
sentences.en: Think about it when you have time. It's not urgent.

sentences.kr: 혹시 관심 있으면, 이것도 옵션 중 하나야.
sentences.en: If you're interested, this is also one of the options.
